novels.title: Tenacity Genius of a Cultivation World

chapters.title: Prologue: Wolf Debt
chapters.content: In the hour between smoke and dawn, the pack cameâ€”teeth like broken moonlight...

chapters.title: Ch. 1: First Breath of Qi
chapters.content: Cold dew beaded on the bark. She traced the meridians like a needle following thread...
